title: Pointset State
description: A set of points reporting telemetry data.

timestamp.description: RFC 3339 timestamp the configuration was generated

state_etag.description: An identifier which uniquely represents the state, and used by a device avoid race conditions where the incoming config is based off an obsolete state. [Additional information on implementation](../docs/specs/sequences/writeback.md)

points.description: Collection of point names, defining the representative point set for this device.

^[a-z][a-z0-9]*(_[a-z0-9]+)*$.description: Object representation for for a single point
